Animate Soul Cage.name: Animate Soul Cage
Animate Soul Cage.description: You have taken the ingenious step of animating your soul cage, transforming it into a living being that fiercely defends itself. Your soul cage becomes an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.companions.Item.zWBSYuhubRFWTbeP]{Animated Soul Cage} with statistics listed below. It becomes your minion, but does not count against the maximum of 4 minions you can have under your control. If your body is destroyed, you can control the animated soul cage directly, although you can’t cast spells while in the vessel. The animated soul cage does not engage in combat unless directly threatened or commanded, preferring to run or hide. Your body is restored inside the animated soul cage, being ejected from it after 1d10 days in the normal manner for a soul cage.

Augmented Summoning.name: 召唤增强 Augmented Summoning
Augmented Summoning.description: 你能用法术位召唤更强大的生物。当你使用不低于4环的法术位施放一个召唤法术时，你能召唤的最大生物等级增加1。

prerequisites.value: 你能从法术位中施放召唤法术

Aura of Rot.name: Aura of Rot
Aura of Rot.description:
You can emit an aura of pervasive, supernatural rot. This aura is a 15-foot emanation, which you can activate or deactivate as a single concentrate action. A living enemy that enters or ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] check against the higher of your spell DC or class DC. Ordinary plants that remain within this aura for more than 1 round wither and begin to die, and creatures with the plant trait have a -2 circumstance penalty to the save. Further, unattended food within the aura immediately spoils.

Success The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to your Aura of Rot for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and can’t reduce its sickened value below 1 while in the emanation. All perishable food, drink, and potions on their person (magical or otherwise) spoil and require a @Check[flat|dc:5] to be ingested.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Special This feat gains the trait that matches your lich tradition (arcane if your lich tradition is arcane, etc).

Basic Graveknight Magic.name: 基础死墓骑士施法 Basic Graveknight Magic
Basic Graveknight Magic.description: 你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.TwSQ0VPXZL0mfPez]{基础有限施法 Basic Bounded Spellcasting Feat}的好处。每当你从此变体中获得一个新环级的法术位时，从你自选的根源中选择一个环级不高于环位的法术并将其加入法术库——可以是常见法术，或你学习、发现的法术。若你拥有引导魔力专长，你必须从该专长对应的根源中选择法术；否则从用来获得此专长的法术位对应根源中选择。

prerequisites.value: 引导魔力或从法术位施法的能力

Beast Form.name: 魔兽形态 Beast Form
Beast Form.description:
频率 每小时一次

你可以变形成几种动物。你获得4环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{害兽形态 Pest Form}法术的效果。14级时，你可以选择花费[AA]来获得4-5环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{御空形态 Aerial Form}（仅限蝙蝠）法术或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form}（仅限犬）法术的效果。

Beautific Appearance.name: Beautific Appearance
Beautific Appearance.description:
Trigger A creature you are aware of that can see you targets you with an attack

You change your appearance minorly to appear more pitiable, causing the attacker to pull back. The target takes a -1 circumstance penalty to the attack roll, possibly causing it to miss, or a -2 if you are not in your phantasmagoria.

Blasphemous Utterances.name: Blasphemous Utterances
Blasphemous Utterances.description: You are accompanied by a constant echo of blasphemous murmurs and tainted whispers. This aura is a 15-foot emanation. Enemies within this aura have a -2 penalty to saving throws against mental effects and can’t take actions that have the concentrate trait unless they succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:8]. Failing this check wastes the action.

Bonecaller.name: Bonecaller
Bonecaller.description: You learn Necril, and add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to your spell list. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal} using a druid spell slot, you can instead summon a skeletal version of the creature, adding the skeleton template and the mindless trait. If you would later gain an animal companion (such as through the Animal Companion druid feat), you can select a skeletal bird of prey, skeletal constrictor, skeletal mount, or a similar non-humanoid skeletal undead companion.

Channel Magic.name: 引导魔力 Channel Magic
Channel Magic.description:
你唤醒潜在的魔力，将强大的魔法注入攻击。如果你还没有从法术位施法的能力，你学会施放自发法术并且获得施法行动。你获得一个法术库，内含一个自选戏法，根源法表可自选。从你选择的根源法表中选择一个常见或你拥有许可的法术。你在法术攻击骰和法术DC上获得受训，你施法的关键属性是魅力。死墓骑士通常选用奥术或神术根源，但原能和异能死墓骑士也不新鲜。

如果你已经拥有从法术位施法的能力，你从施法根源中获得一个额外戏法。如果你是一个准备施法者，你每天能额外准备一个戏法；如果你是自发施法者，你将新戏法加入你的法术库。

此外，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{法术打击 Spellstrike}行动。你可以让其自动充能，这需要一分钟。即使你获得了其他能再充能法术打击的能力，此限制仍然有效。

若你已经拥有法术打击行动，你转而从所选施法根源中获得第二个戏法。

Charnel Soldiers.name: 阴尸士兵 Charnel Soldiers
Charnel Soldiers.description:
先决条件 末日缪斯吟游诗人、拥有伤害源泉的牧师、骨灰教派德鲁伊、骸骨秘示域先知、不死血脉术士、拥有不死幻灵的召唤兽、墓土语者女巫、界限学派法师或默语魔道学派法师

你训练那些不太聪明的不死生物进行基本合作。位于你周围15尺弥漫范围内的，你控制下的无心智不死仆从获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{反应打击 Reactive Strike}反应动作。满足需求的仆从在其回合开始时获得一个只能用来反应打击的反应动作。

prerequisites.value: ability to cast summon undead from spell slots or you are an ossuarite druid

Clinging Climber (HWW).name: 附壁而行 Clinging Climber (HWW)
Clinging Climber (HWW).description: 你能够如同蜘蛛一般攀爬。你获得15尺攀爬速度。如果你有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.P04Hw8E6WAWARKHP]{迅速攀爬 Quick Climb}专长，你获得的攀爬速度等同于你的陆地速度。

Clutching Armor.name: 缠结护甲 Clutching Armor
Clutching Armor.description:
触发 一个生物试图离开你的触及

你的护甲活化，试图抓住触发生物。对目标尝试一次-2减值的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}检定。成功时，你的护甲擒拿住对方，你无需空出一只手来维持擒拿。你只能以这种方式同时擒拿一个生物。

Cold Spot.name: Cold Spot
Cold Spot.description:
An unnatural cold sweeps around you. Characters that enter or begin their turn within your phantasmagoria take @Damage[(1+floor(((@actor.level)-1)/4))d4[cold]] damage. This effect counts as extreme cold.

Level (+4) The damage increases by 1d4.

Command Undead (HWW).name: 命令亡灵 Command Undead (HWW)
Command Undead (HWW).description:
你掌握了不死生物中活动的力量，并按照自己的愿望扭转它。如果下个你使用的动作是以一个不死生物为目标施放一个2动作的法术，法术效果被改变。代替法术通常的效果，如果目标的等级不高于法术环级，它会被你控制。目标可以尝试一次意志豁免来抵抗被你控制。如果目标已经被某人控制，控制者也尝试一次豁免骰，该不死生物使用较好的结果。如果目标并非无心智生物，此效果获得失能特征。

大成功 目标不受影响，并临时免疫24小时。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 该不死生物成为仆从，并且受你控制。该法术获得1分钟的持续时间，但会在你或者你的盟友攻击该不死生物时结束。

大失败 如同失败，但持续时间为1小时。

特殊 如果施放的法术为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{束缚死灵 Bind Undead}，持续时间总是一天，且目标等级可以最大等于2*（法术环级-4）。

Corporeal Manifestation.name: Corporeal Manifestation
Corporeal Manifestation.description: You cause yourself to become physical with extreme focus. Until the beginning of your next turn, you lose the incorporeal trait, as well as any resistances or immunities related to your ghostly form (such as those granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pwM4RGwCTLiVSic0]{Ghostly Resistance}). This does not remove your undead benefits, nor any bonuses granted by them. You cannot use this ability while in your phantasmagoria.

Corrupting Gaze.name: Corrupting Gaze
Corrupting Gaze.description:
You stare a creature in the eyes, causing them to wither. Select a creature that can see you within 30 feet. The target takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level)/2))d6[void]] damage with a @Check[will|against:class-spell|traits:damaging-effect|basic] save. A creature that fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for one round (or one minute on a critical failure).

Level (+2) The void damage increases by 1d6.

Danse Macabre.name: Danse Macabre
Danse Macabre.description: Your music affects the dead as well as the living. Your mental and emotion spells always affect undead creatures, even if they have the mindless trait. Additionally, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} with undead (mindless or otherwise) using Performance in place of Diplomacy. You also learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.spells.Item.28Ov8EhBljtSYMdU]{Dirge of Comfort} composition spell, which eases the minds of your allies.

Dark Deliverance.name: 黑暗救赎 Dark Deliverance
Dark Deliverance.description: 你的血肉变硬，可以抵御试图摧毁你的魔法和非魔法效果。你获得对精魂伤害和非魔法伤害的抗力，数值等于你从死墓骑士变体中获得的专长数量，最大达到你等级的一半。

Deathly Waltz.name: Deathly Waltz
Deathly Waltz.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead} this turn.

You call upon classic waltzes to entwine two animate undead, allowing you to sustain both at once. You Sustain your previous casting of summon undead, binding the two spells together. On subsequent rounds, you can Sustain both summon undead spells with a single action to Sustain the Spell, which gains the composition trait. This benefit lasts until either of the spells ends.

Devastating Blast.name: 毁灭爆震 Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description:
你在@Template[cone|distance:30]范围中释放毁灭性的能量。区域中的生物承受类型和你毁灭元素相同的@Damage[(floor((@actor.level)/2))d12[@actor.flags.pf2e.graveknightArchetype.ruinous-element]]伤害，@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|traits:damaging-effect|basic]豁免对抗你的职业DC或法术DC，以较高者为准。

特殊 该专长获得与你毁灭元素相同的特征。

升级（+2） 伤害增加1d12。

Drain Dry.name: 吸干抹净 Drain Dry
Drain Dry.description:
当你使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.p0I1DIcTJcAmJqz4]{饮血 Drink Blood}时，你可以继续吸干生物的血液直至死亡。当你在回合中第一次对一个生物使用饮血时，不管你之前是否吸过它的血，它的流失状态值都增加1。

如果一个HP因饮血被降至0的生物死亡，你可以给该生物喂一些你的血（你受到@Damage[1[bleed]]伤害）并将其埋进土里3个晚上，通过这种方式将其转化。这通常会创造出一个吸血鬼子嗣，但根据GM的裁量，也可能诞生一个与你相近的更强吸血鬼。若一个新生吸血鬼的等级至少低于你4级，它会成为你控制下的仆从。你可以控制的吸血鬼仆从数量最多等于你的魅力调整值；之后新生的仆从不再受你控制。这些吸血鬼和你控制下的其他仆从分别计算，但同一时间，你仍然只能主动控制最多4个仆从。

Draining Touch.name: Draining Touch
Draining Touch.description: You touch a creature, attempting to drain their life. Make an unarmed Strike against a creature. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or drained 2 on a critical success) and you gain temporary hit points equal to half your level, which last for one minute.

Dread Lichdom.name: Dread Lichdom
Dread Lichdom.description: With time, you have mastered your undead form, allowing you to gain the more powerful benefits of your undead form and your Path. You gain the advanced undead benefits. Additionally, you gain your path’s Advanced Ability.

Eager for Battle.name: 战斗饥渴 Eager for Battle
Eager for Battle.description: 你对战斗的饥渴是如此迫切，战斗一开始你便投身其中。当你骰先攻时，你掷骰两次并取较好的结果；这是一个幸运效果。另外，你在先攻后的战斗第一轮获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态。你只能用这个额外动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Step}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{行走 Stride}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strike}。

Exemplar of Violence.name: 暴力典范 Exemplar of Violence
Exemplar of Violence.description: 你发出战吼，刺激你的盟友实施暴力。对一个生物进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strike}。若命中，所有你周围@Template[emanation|distance:15]内的自愿盟友可以用一个反应动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{行走 Stride}，但必须在敌人附近结束移动。若你重击，你可以让一个盟友进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strike}，而非行走。

prerequisites.value: 军用武器熟练度为大师

Expert Graveknight Magic.name: 专家死墓骑士施法 Expert Graveknight Magic
Expert Graveknight Magic.description: 你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.TwSQ0VPXZL0mfPez]{专家有限施法 Expert Bounded Spellcasting Benefits}的好处。

Fade.name: Fade
Fade.description:
You can disappear at a moment’s notice. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until the beginning of your next turn. You can Sustain this effect. If you use a hostile action, the invisibility ends after that action is completed.

You can activate this ability as an impulse if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.UQKixX8OnA05rrAk]{Phantasmagoria} archetype feat. If you do, it gains the impulse trait, loses the concentrate trait, and does not end when you take a hostile action. When doing so, however, your phantasmagoria’s visual effects are not concealed. You must still sustain it, but sustaining it does not require you to concentrate.

Ghost Storm.name: Ghost Storm
Ghost Storm.description:
A swirling tempest of wind surrounds you, extinguishing small fires, dispersing fog and mist, and blowing around objects. Your phantasmagoria’s radius increases by 5 feet. Squares within your phantasmagoria are considered difficult terrain and flying creatures (excluding yourself) are always considered to be moving against the wind. 

Level (+4) Your phantasmagoria’s radius increases by an additional 5 feet.

Ghost Whisperer.name: 幽灵语者 Ghost Whisperer
Ghost Whisperer.description: 你的话语安抚了死者与不死者。你学会死灵语，在针对不死生物的交涉、欺骗、威吓和察觉检定上获得+1环境加值。不死生物对你的初始态度提高一级，最高达到不关心（通常从敌对到不友善），除非原本态度更好。

prerequisites.value: 在死灵学识或类似学识技能上为大师

Grand Summoner.name: 大召唤师 Grand Summoner
Grand Summoner.description: 你维持召唤法术的能力无人能及。你永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}。你只能用这个额外动作来维持一个召唤法术。

prerequisites.value: 你能从法术位施放召唤法术

Grave Companion.name: Grave Companion
Grave Companion.description:
Your companion radiates an aura of necrotic energy which causes foes to crumble to dust. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3r5rg0BCqSh5RBNS]{Specialized Companion} druid feat. Your companion can select one of the usual specializations or the grave specialization.

Grave mounts gain the following benefits: Your companion causes life around it to decay and return to the soul. Its proficiency rank in Nature increases to expert, it can speak Necril, and its Intelligence modifier increases by 1 and its Wisdom modifier by 1. The companion gains a necrotic aura, causing any creature that ends its turn within a 10-foot emanation to take 4d6 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. It can activate or deactivate this as an action, and you are immune to its effects.

Grave Squire.name: 死墓侍从 Grave Squire
Grave Squire.description:
你可以将你的护甲碎片送给一个等级比你低的自愿盟友，让它成为你的死墓侍从。若一个生物是你的死墓侍从，只要你们还在同一位面就可以通过心灵感应沟通，而且可以在任意距离通过侍从的感官观察。另外，你能以神术内在法术的形式通过这种链接对侍从随意施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion}，使用你的法术DC或职业DC，以较高者为准。侍从对抗你暗示术的豁免成功度视为更差一级。

另外，如果你的主护甲被摧毁，侍从的护甲碎片会在1d10天内复盖其身体，将其变成你的新身体。你同时只能拥有一个侍从，如果你想创造一个新侍从，必须先回收先前赠予的碎片。

侍从持有碎片时，它在攻击骰上获得+1状态加值，针对你的毁灭元素获得相当于它等级一半的抗力。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.DxXt30w5lkPzcxm1]{效果：死墓侍从}

Graveknight Armor Training.name: 死墓骑士护甲训练 Graveknight Armor Training
Graveknight Armor Training.description: 护甲如同你的第二层皮肤，会随着你变强而成长。你在重甲上获得专家熟练度。在14级，你在重甲上获得大师熟练度。20级时，如果你在军用武器上有大师熟练度，你在重甲上获得传奇熟练度。

Graveknight Dedication.name: 死墓骑士入门 Graveknight Dedication
Graveknight Dedication.description:
你已死，但灵魂仍在徘徊，拒绝屈服于死亡的枷锁。你获得不死特征和基础不死增益。你的不死饥渴是战斗。死墓骑士拥有以下主要能力：

盔甲联结 Bound Armor 你的身体与灵魂和你从死亡中重生的盔甲绑定。你的护甲变成一套死墓骑士护甲，你无法移除这套护甲，且它自动绑定，其他功能如正常护甲。花费一周休整期可以让你将自己转移到另一套重甲上；那套护甲变成死墓骑士护甲，之前那套则变回化为死墓骑士护甲前的样子。你复活时，你的死墓骑士护甲也跟着恢复原状。

毁灭元素 Ruinous Element 当你复活时，你和一个与生前主旨相关的元素调谐。从以下伤害类型中选择一种：酸蚀，寒冷，电击或火焰。任何你持握的武器（只要你对其具有熟练度）变成+1强击武器，除非它本身更好，同时根据你的毁灭元素获得侵蚀、霜冻、电击或炽焰符文。当你的等级不小于14级时，它获得以上性能符文的高等版本效果。这些符文正常计入武器符文上限。

prerequisites.value: 你死亡并作为死墓骑士重生

Graveknight Specialization.name: 死墓骑士专精 Graveknight Specialization
Graveknight Specialization.description: 你掌握护甲和武器的技巧得到超自然的强化。你握持的任何武器都获得重击专精效果，只要你拥有使用它们的熟练度。你还获得死墓骑士护甲的护甲专精效果。

Graveknight's Shield.name: 死墓骑士之盾 Graveknight's Shield
Graveknight's Shield.description:
你的诅咒延伸至盾牌，或者你的护甲扭曲创造出一面盾牌。你获得神卫的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.QQP0mu0cyWIwNUh9]{坚盾神圣盟友 Shield Divine Ally}职业特性：选取此专长时你获得一面钢盾，或者将神圣盟友效果附加到你当前拥有的盾牌上。和你的护甲类似，你可以通过花费一周休整期将盾牌盟友上的诅咒转移到另一面盾牌上；你可以同时转移护甲和盾牌。你的盾牌在你休息时自动恢复满生命值，它只能如你的护甲般被摧毁；当你未受伤时，你可以用一个一分钟的行动让盾牌传送到你身边，只要它和你处于同一位面。

你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.eZNCckLzbH3GyncH]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}专长（若你还没有的话）；若你已经有盾牌格挡专长，你转而获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pRqcm5P2ZFihSpVI]{快速盾牌格挡 Quick Shield Block}战士专长。

Greater Unlife.name: Greater Unlife
Greater Unlife.description: You dance between life and death, gaining the benefits of both. You don’t take void damage, and are healed by void effects that heal undead. If you already have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.Item.3mUx8vXEQkiIuBcR]{Void Healing}, you no longer take vitality damage, and are healed by vitality effects that heal the living. You are immune to the drained condition, and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against disease and poison.

Hand of the Lich (HWW).name: Hand of the Lich (HWW)
Hand of the Lich (HWW).description:
Void energy intensifies your undead form and makes your very touch the antithesis of life. The damage die for your first increases to 1d6 instead of 1d4; if it was already 1d6, it increases to 1d8. It loses the nonlethal trait and becomes magical. When you Strike with it, you may have it deal void damage instead of bludgeoning damage. When attacking with it, you may use your @Check[spell-attack] modifier instead of your unarmed attack modifier; when doing so, you do not add your Strength or Dexterity to the damage. 

When you critically hit a living creature with your fist Strike, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC. This is a critical specialization effect.

Haunted Eyes.name: Haunted Eyes
Haunted Eyes.description: Your connection to death protects you against effects that would draw you closer to it. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves made against death, fear, and void effects. You also gain resistance to void damage equal to half your level.

Haunting Refrain.name: Haunting Refrain
Haunting Refrain.description: While performing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vWrGwqy4AhHMPz8V]{Dirge of Doom}, you can stir feelings of sorrow within your foes instead of fear. Targets become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} in addition to being frightened, and can’t reduce their stupefied value below 1 while they remain in the area.

Hungry Ghost Stance.name: Hungry Ghost Stance
Hungry Ghost Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

 You enter a twisted stance that allows you to draw life force from other creatures. The only Strikes you can make are hungry ghost Strikes. These deal 1d4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the deadly d4, finesse, unarmed, and void traits.

If you hit a living creature in this stance with an unarmed strike, you can regain hit points equal to the number of damage dice the strike deals.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.cSVViwh0DU2mAdFH]{Stance: Hungry Ghost Stance}

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

Improved Command Undead (HWW).name: 精通命令亡灵 Improved Command Undead (HWW)
Improved Command Undead (HWW).description: 不死生物无法抵抗你的命令。当你使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.SzMM4aLhw4ChNfmd]{命令亡灵 Command Undead (WW)}时，如果不死生物的豁免成功，但是没有大成功，它会成为你的仆从1轮。如果该不死生物在豁免中失败，它会成为你的仆从10分钟。如果它大失败，它会成为你的仆从24小时。如果使用的法术是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{束缚死灵 Bind Undead}且不死生物大失败，它被永久控制，就如被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{唤起死灵 Create Undead}仪式复活一般。

Know It All.name: Know It All
Know It All.description: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled. When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

Lich Dedication (HWW).name: Lich Dedication (HWW)
Lich Dedication (HWW).description:
After years of studying and careful planning, you have performed the proper ritual successfully to transform yourself into a lich. Your form may be changed, shaped by the magic and goal of your ritual, but one thing is certain: neither death nor time can prevent you from pursuing your purpose and achieving your grand ambitions. You gain the undead trait and the basic undead benefits, as well as the effects of your chosen path 

Before performing the ritual, you select a Path that you meet the requirements for. Upon gaining this feat, you gain the undead hunger of that path, as well as its basic ability.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the lich archetype.

prerequisites.value: ability to cast 6th-level or higher spells from spell slots
completed ritual to become a lich
other requirements based on lichdom path

Lich's Flesh.name: Lich's Flesh
Lich's Flesh.description: Your flesh has been hardened against magical and non-magical effects that seek to destroy it. You gain resistance to spirit damage and non-magical damage equal to your number of class feats from the Vassallich and Lich archetypes, to a maximum of half your level.

Life Funnel.name: Life Funnel
Life Funnel.description: Your master of the hungry ghost stance allows you to almost literally draw blood from a stone. You can now regain hit points with hungry ghost stance from any creature, not just living creatures. Additionally, whenever you would regain hit points or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.bSoieGZ2V6810mXs]{Steal Ki} from a creature, you can immediately make a saving throw against one poison or disease affecting you, adding a status bonus to the saving throw equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Lord Beyond the Grave.name: Lord Beyond the Grave
Lord Beyond the Grave.description:
Your mastery over the undead allows you to assert control over powerful undead creatures on a whim. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{Bind Undead} as an innate spell of your tradition once per day. The spell is heightened to half your level, rounded up. In addition, if you're able to target the mostly intact remains of an appropriate type of dead creature when casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}, the undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of summon undead.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication} archetype feat, this bonus increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.ix7pMilyCZOY6cNY]{Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+1)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.oIxSLw0ykwpwtfAK]{Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+2)}

Lord of Death.name: Lord of Death
Lord of Death.description:
You have managed to form a small cult around yourself, garnishing enough followers to provide a divine power to your flock, allowing them to select you as their deity when determining spells and domains. Choose:

  • Edicts

  • Anathema

  • Areas of Concern

These determine the nature of your faith. In addition, you also choose:

  • Two Divine Abilities, both of which you must be at least +2 in.

  • A divine skill, one which you are at least Trained in.

  • Two Domains, as well as the Death and Undeath domains.

  • A 1st level non-divine spell. A 4th level or lower non-divine spell, and a 7th level or lower non-divine spell

  • A chosen weapon, one which you are at least Trained in.

  • A your chosen fonts (either harm or healing and harm)

  • Whether you grant sanctification, as per the Cleric ability.

You grant access to those abilities as if you were a deity. You also become sanctified as per your sanctification, and can cast each of your chosen non-divine spells as a divine innate spell once per day, heightened to half your level.

prerequisites.value: legendary in your tradition's associated skill

Macabre Virtuoso (Investigator).name: Macabre Virtuoso (Investigator)
Macabre Virtuoso (Investigator).description:
Any necromancer can create zombies and skeletons, but you know the secrets behind the creation of far more advanced undead monstrosities. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{Create Undead} rituals to create two types of common undead for which you meet the prerequisites. (Your GM might give you access to additional types of undead.) You can't teach these rituals to anyone else and you can't participate in either ritual while allowing someone else to serve as the primary caster unless they also know the ritual. When you reach a new level, you can change either or both of these rituals to a different type of undead for which you now meet the prerequisites.

When acting as primary caster, you can perform all create undead rituals in 4 hours instead of 1 day and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your primary check. You can also perform the ritual without the aid of a secondary caster, in which case you attempt the secondary check.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you learn the rituals to create two more types of undead creatures.

Malevolent Possession.name: Malevolent Possession
Malevolent Possession.description:
Requirements you are adjacent to a corporeal creature

You attempt to possess an adjacent corporeal creature. This has the same effect as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell, except it doesn’t have the concentrate trait and since you don’t have a physical body, you are unaffected by the restriction of the spell. While you are possessing a creature, you can still enter your phantasmagoria and use Ghost archetype impulses.

At 18th level, the duration becomes 10 minutes.

Mask Death.name: Mask Death
Mask Death.description: You shape your magic to appear largely as you did in life, with slight changes depending on your lich appearance - for example, your skin may appear more pale or sallow, you may have a faint glow if you are a Pale Herald, or may emit a foul odor if you are a Lich of Yhidothrus. You lose access to any abilities related to your physical lich form while in this state, and automatically revert to your normal form when you take damage.

Master Graveknight Magic.name: 大师死墓骑士施法 Master Graveknight Magic
Master Graveknight Magic.description: 你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.TwSQ0VPXZL0mfPez]{大师有限施法 Master Bounded Spellcasting Benefits}的好处。

Masterful Metamagic.name: Masterful Metamagic
Masterful Metamagic.description:
Your mentor teaches your powerful metamagics to manipulate your spells. You gain one feat from the Wizard class with the spellshape trait. You do not need to be a Wizard, but must meet all other requirements.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different spellshape feat each time.

Mournful Melody.name: Mournful Melody
Mournful Melody.description: You’ve learned to combine the notes of your dirges to affect both enemies and allies at once. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xLVcA8Y1onw7toT]{Dirge of Doom}, you may spend a focus point to also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.spells.Item.28Ov8EhBljtSYMdU]{Dirge of Comfort} with the same action. Unlike normal for composition spells, casting dirge of comfort doesn’t end dirge of doom, and you can continue to cast both with the same action for the next minute or until you either stop casting one or cast a different composition spell.

Necromancer's Visage (HWW).name: Necromancer's Visage (HWW)
Necromancer's Visage (HWW).description:
Prerequisites dirge muse bard, cleric with a negative font, ossuarite druid, oracle of bones, summoner with undead eidolon, grave whisper witch, school of the boundary wizard, or school of the whispering way wizard

Necromantic energy demonstrates your power over undead, creating a demeanor that commands their fear and respect. Undead creatures can immediately sense your Necromancer's Visage and tend to act accordingly. If you take a hostile action against an undead creature, it becomes permanently immune to your Necromancer's Visage, and your Necromancer's Visage ends. You can spend 10 minutes to restore your Necromancer's Visage, though any creatures that became permanently immune remain so. Each time an undead creature 2 or more levels lower than you attacks you, it must attempt a Will save against your spell DC. If you're also affected by sanctuary or a similar effect, only one affects the attacker (you choose which).

Critical Success The creature is permanently immune to your Necromancer's Visage.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against you this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack you and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against you this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack you as long as your Necromancer's Visage persists.

Special This feat has the trait matching your spellcasting tradition.

prerequisites.value: ability to create or control undead

Necromantic Affinity.name: 死灵亲和 Necromantic Affinity
Necromantic Affinity.description: 你针对死亡效果、毒素和疾病的豁免检定获得+1环境加值。此外，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.Item.3mUx8vXEQkiIuBcR]{虚能治疗 Void Healing}能力。

Paralytic Fear.name: 麻痹之惧 Paralytic Fear
Paralytic Fear.description:
当你使用掠食突袭时，取代原本的运动检定，你可以强迫生物用@Check[will|against:class-spell]豁免对抗你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准）。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标因恐惧陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}，直到你下回合结束。

失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}，且对抗你的饮血能力时其强韧DC受到-2环境减值，持续到你下回合结束。

大失败 同失败，且目标还陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Path Spellcasting.name: Path Spellcasting
Path Spellcasting.description: Your Path grants you specific magic that you always have prepared, as does lichdom itself. You gain your Path’s listed Path Spells as innate spells of your tradition, each of which you can cast once per day. Some of these spells might not be on your tradition’s list, but they’re spells of your tradition when cast this way. Each spell is automatically heightened to 4th level when you cast them. You can also prepare these spells or add them to your repertoire just like the spells normally on your tradition’s spell list.

prerequisites.value: master in your tradition’s associated skill

Phantasmagoria.name: Phantasmagoria
Phantasmagoria.description: The memory of your life often causes you to lash out, making your powers stronger when you remember what once was. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.A0gLg26PVyD5B7YM]{Remember Life} action, which lets you activate your phantasmagoria. You also gain a 4th-level Ghost feat of your choice with the impulse trait.

Phantom Mount.name: 魅影坐骑 Phantom Mount
Phantom Mount.description: 你唤出一匹幽灵坐骑。你施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WPKJOhEihhcIm2uQ]{异影驹 Marvelous Mount}法术，它自动升环到你等级的一半，只能以你自己为目标。和正常异影驹不同，这匹坐骑的HP等于6*你的等级，且持续时间无限。若坐骑被摧毁，你必须等待1小时才能再次使用此能力。

Pillage Mind.name: Pillage Mind
Pillage Mind.description:
Your very touch can pull memories from a creature for your perusal. Make an unarmed strike against a creature. If the strike deals damage, you pull a memory or thought from the creature’s mind. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} with a skill of your choice, using the target’s bonus with the skill instead of your own. If there’s a very specific piece of information you hope to uncover, and the creature knows that information, the creature can attempt a @Check[will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC to keep it secret. On a critical success, the target can feed the lich faulty information. In addition, you may have your unarmed strikes deal mental damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

Special This feat gains the trait that matches your lich tradition (arcane if your lich tradition is arcane, etc).

Portentous Glare.name: 凶兆怒视 Portentous Glare
Portentous Glare.description: 你的目光是压倒性的威胁。当你对一个能看到你双眼的生物挫败士气时，你的威吓检定获得+1环境加值。成功或大成功时，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}，或者增加1点毁灭值，且只要它在回合结束时仍在你的目光范围内，就无法将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}值降到1以下。

Predatory Assault.name: 掠食突袭 Predatory Assault
Predatory Assault.description: 你的指甲长成了锐利的尖爪，尤其适合抓住并且撕裂你的猎物。你获得爪抓无武装攻击，它造成1d4点挥砍伤害。你的爪抓属于搏击武器组，具有灵巧、致命d6、娴熟红染无武装特征。此外，若你拥有尖牙无武装打击，它获得致命d8特征。你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.D3RL76US7bu3mty0]{掠食突袭 Predatory Assault}行动。

Punishing Kick.name: Punishing Kick
Punishing Kick.description:
Your kicks launch creatures away from you. When you target the same creature with two Strikes from your Flurry of Blows, you can try to push the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed a Fortitude save against your class DC or be pushed up to 5 feet away from you (or 10 feet on a critical failure). You can then Stride after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.

Special If you have this feat, while you are in Hungry Ghost Stance, you can instead push the target an additional 5 feet if you are Expert in Athletics, 10 feet if you are Master in Athletics, or 15 feet if you are Legendary in Athletics. This bonus is doubled on a critical failure.

Pyre's Memory.name: Pyre's Memory
Pyre's Memory.description: You empower your attacks with memories of fire scorching your flesh. When you use Telekinetic Assault, you can give it the overflow and fire traits. If you do, it deals an additional 1d6 fire for every 2 levels you have. Fires are set within the area that the impulse effects, which last for 1 minute and don’t set other things ablaze unless you wish. You can dismiss any existing flames as a single action with the concentrate trait.

Ritual Assistant.name: Ritual Assistant
Ritual Assistant.description: Your sponsor has taught you the best ways to perform rituals, especially as an assistant. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to primary and secondary checks you attempt as part of casting a ritual. When you roll a success at a secondary check as part of casting a ritual, you get a critical success instead.

Runecarved Bones.name: Runecarved Bones
Runecarved Bones.description:
Through careful modification of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.equipment.Item.v826Iow1pH7xEqo6]{Soul Cage (HWW)} (or similar object), you become capable of storing magical items within yourself without your soul cage regenerating the changes, allowing you to use them on command. You gain the following benefits:

Arm Wands You can store up to two wands in the radius and ulna of one of your arms. These wands can be used as if wielded, and cannot be disarmed. If an arm wand is overcharged, you take @Damage[20] damage if the wand is broken or @Damage[40] if it’s destroyed. You can exchange one of these wands for another wand on your person during your daily preparations.

Stored Weapon You carve several runes into the bones of your arms (typically the arm without the arm wands), allowing you to link a single weapon to it and store it in an extradimensional space. Over the course of a week (or upon first gaining this feat), you can bind a weapon that you are at least trained in to this arm. It gains the invested and magical trait if it didn’t have it already. When you would Draw or Stow a Weapon while the weapon is invested, you can instead summon this weapon to your hand or dismiss it back to its extradimensional storage. You dismiss the weapon from any distance, so long as you are on the same plane.

When making an attack with a weapon bound to you in this manner,  you may use your @Check[spell-attack] modifier instead of your weapon attack modifier; when doing so, you do not add your Strength or Dexterity to the damage. Additionally, if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.PjwVieTk1EJJNwve]{Hand of the Lich} feat, the weapon attack deals additional damage equal to half the number of dice from your fist attack (minimum 1), and you may have the weapon use your fist’s critical specialization effect instead of its own. For the purposes of any other feats such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.7fjW0SkbWUFimN7s]{Siphon Life}, an attack with this weapon counts as a fist attack.

Sacreligious Aura.name: 渎圣灵光 Sacreligious Aura
Sacreligious Aura.description: 你在场便让附近的命能魔力告吹消失。此灵光范围为30尺弥漫。当一个灵光中的敌人尝试使用命能法术时，它必须尝试一次@Check[flat|dc:5]检定，失败则法术失败，动作被浪费。

Sepulchral Sublimation (HWW).name: Sepulchral Sublimation (HWW)
Sepulchral Sublimation (HWW).description:
Prerequisites dirge muse bard, cleric with a negative font, ossuarite druid, oracle of bones, summoner with undead eidolon, grave whisper witch, school of the boundary wizard, or school of the whispering way wizard

Requirements You have at least one undead minion that you permanently control.

You repurpose the void energy that flows through your minions at a moment's notice. Instantly destroy one undead minion within 60 feet that is permanently under your control. If your next action is to cast a necromancy spell from a spell slot, you don't expend the slot. The spell's rank must be half the destroyed minion's level or lower and the spell can't have a duration.

Special This feat has the trait matching your spellcasting tradition.

prerequisites.value: ability to permanently create or control undead

Share Trauma.name: Share Trauma
Share Trauma.description:
You cause a creature within 30 feet to relive the experience of your death. The target takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level)/2))d4[mental,persistent]] damage with a @Check[will|against:class-spell|traits:damaging-effect|basic] save. On a failure, all other creatures are concealed to the target until the persistent damage ends as they are immersed in the experience of your death.

Level (+2) The persistent damage increases by 1d4.

Siphon Life.name: Siphon Life
Siphon Life.description:
Your wicked touch pulls life from whatever it hits. Make an unarmed strike against a creature. If the strike deals damage, you regain hit points equal to half the damage dealt. In addition, you may have your unarmed strikes deal spirit damage instead of bludgeoning damage. If you do, it gains the unholy trait unless you are sanctified, in which case it gains your sanctification trait.

Special This feat gains the trait that matches your lich tradition (arcane if your lich tradition is arcane, etc).

Spell Gem (HWW).name: Spell Gem (HWW)
Spell Gem (HWW).description:
Inspired by the degenerate demiliches your kind sometimes devolves into, you've embedded a gem into your brow, fusing it to your necrotic flesh. This gem has been specially calibrated to hold one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight}. You must decide which spell your gem contains when you take this feat; changing the spell requires retraining the feat. Once per day, you can drain the gem's magical energy to Cast the Spell without spending a spell slot. Alternatively, you can drain the gem’s magical energy to cast your Path’s Spell Gem Spell without spending a spell slot. This spell is heightened to 6th rank if it is lower

At 18th level, you can heighten whichever spell you cast to 7th rank. At 20th level, you can heighten whichever spell you cast to 8th rank; regardless of which spell you chose, you can instead drain the gem's magical energy to cast an 8th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning} without spending a spell slot.

Spellstealing Counter.name: Spellstealing Counter
Spellstealing Counter.description:
You have magically engraved yourself with symbols that allow you to absorb and replicate magic. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.xGzb0jzFCY3PDJdI]{Spellstealing Counter} reaction and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.mSk4z9tJ1UUutFSZ]{Spellsteal Transmutation} action.

Special Spellstealing Counter and Spellsteal Transmutation gain the trait that matches your lich tradition (arcane if your lich tradition is arcane, etc).

prerequisites.value: legendary in your tradition's associated skill

Sponsor's Lesson.name: Sponsor's Lesson
Sponsor's Lesson.description:
You have learned from your mentors' writings uniquely powerful magics. Select one basic lesson from the Witch class. You gain its hex as a focus spell of your lich tradition and you Learn its spell.

Special You can select this feat one additional time at 10th level; when you do, you can select a greater lesson instead.

Steal Ki.name: Steal Ki
Steal Ki.description:
Through the usage of the hungry ghost stance, monks are capable of bolstering their own life force and even regaining lost ki. Whenever you would regain hit points due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.zTnYcqUG22WPXxtN]{Hungry Ghost Stance}, you may instead gain temporary hit points equal to the regained hit points.

Additionally, whenever you would critically hit or reduce a creature to 0 with a hungry ghost Strike, you can steal some of the creature’s ki. Instead of regaining hit points, you can immediately regain one Focus Point. Once you do this, you cannot steal any more ki from that creature for the next 24 hours.

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description:
You cause small objects to fly about in a @Template[burst|distance:5] within 60 feet. You deal your choice of @Damage[(floor((@actor.level)/2)-1)d6] bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage to all creatures in the area, with a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|traits:damaging-effect|basic] save. You can spend up to 3 actions activating this impulse; for each additional action, you create an additional 5-foot burst. Your 5-foot bursts cannot overlap.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

The Dead Speak.name: The Dead Speak
The Dead Speak.description: You know the rites to call upon a creature’s spirit, allowing it to speak once again. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse} twice per day as an occult innate spell. You may have the corpse roll its Will save against your investigator class DC instead of your spell DC.

Threnodic Spell.name: 恐惧法术 Threnodic Spell
Threnodic Spell.description: 你可以改变魔法来影响不死生物。如果你下一个动作是对一个不死生物施放一个具有心灵特征的法术，忽略该生物对心灵效果的免疫。这也允许法术影响无心智不死生物。然而，该法术对任何不死生物外的目标无效。

prerequisites.value: 宗教、死灵学识或一个相似学识受训

Turn to Mist (HWW).name: 化为迷雾 Turn to Mist (HWW)
Turn to Mist (HWW).description:
频率 每小时一次

你化作一团雾气，获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{汽化形体 Vapor Form}的效果。18级时，汽化形体持续时间为无限。

Undying Conviction (HWW).name: Undying Conviction (HWW)
Undying Conviction (HWW).description:
Prerequisites dirge muse bard, cleric with a negative font, ossuarite druid, oracle of bones, summoner with undead eidolon, grave whisper witch, school of the boundary wizard, or school of the whispering way wizard

Your presence has a bolstering effect on your undead minions. Undead creatures under your control and within a @Template[emanation|distance:30] around you gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist vitality damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.cGwFYusGTsJR3x3P]{Effect: Under Control}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.e6mv68aarIbQ3tXL]{Effect: Undying Conviction}

Special This feat has the trait matching your spellcasting tradition.

prerequisites.value: able to create or control undead

Unlife.name: Unlife
Unlife.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects caused by undead creatures. Additionally, you become immune to paralysis caused by the abilities of undead creatures.

Vampire Dedication (HWW).name: 吸血鬼入门 Vampire Dedication (HWW)
Vampire Dedication (HWW).description:
你作为一只吸血鬼而重获新生。你获得不死和吸血鬼特征，并且获得基础不死增益。选择2-4个吸血鬼能力并获得其基础能力；每选择一个吸血鬼能力，你也会获得一个自选的吸血鬼弱点。你的不死饥渴是渴求活物的鲜血，但这可以被你的吸血鬼能力改变。你还获得饮血能力。

饮血 Drink Blood 1 (神术，操作，虚能) 需求 一名受擒、麻痹、束缚、失去意识、或自愿的生物在你的触及范围内；效果 你将尖牙刺入这名生物，吸吮他的鲜血。如果受害者受擒，该能力需要进行一次运动检定对抗受害者的强韧DC，在其他的情况下则自动成功。如果你成功了，该生物陷入流失1，并且你将获得等同于目标等级的临时生命，持续10分钟。继续地对目标使用该能力不会增加流失状态值，也不会赋予你更多的临时生命。

特殊 直至选取另外2个吸血鬼变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

prerequisites.value: 你被一个吸血鬼杀害并复活

Vampire Master.name: 吸血鬼大君 Vampire Master
Vampire Master.description:
通过亵渎誓言或血脉，你变得比普通吸血鬼更强大。你获得进阶不死增益。另外，你获得你其中一个吸血鬼能力的进阶能力。

特殊 你可以额外选择此专长，最多再选3次。每次选择时，选择你的另一项吸血鬼能力，并获得它的进阶能力。

Vampiric Bloodcall.name: 血系召唤 Vampiric Bloodcall
Vampiric Bloodcall.description: 你的吸血鬼魔力比正常具有魔法倾向的吸血鬼要强。你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.S1Msrwi990FE7uMO]{唤血术 Call The Blood}，每天一次，它升阶至等于你等级一半的环级。当你升至12级时，你可以用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fd31tAHSSGXyOxW6]{血族驱命 Vampiric Exsanguination}代替唤血术，同样升阶至等于你等级一半的环级。

Vampiric Durability.name: 吸血鬼韧性 Vampiric Durability
Vampiric Durability.description: 你的身体特别强韧。你获得对物理伤害（除了命源武器和你的材料弱点武器）的抗力，数值等于你从吸血鬼变体获得的职业专长数量，最高为你等级的一半。

Vampiric Levitation.name: 吸血鬼悬浮 Vampiric Levitation
Vampiric Levitation.description: 你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{浮空术 Levitate}，只能对自己施放，持续到你解消法术为止。对自己施放时，你不承受攻击检定上的减值，并总被认为处于稳定状态。你旋转自己是毫无问题的，因此你可以随意攀岩走壁或在其他表面上行走，只要这些表面可以通过且能支撑你的体重。

Vassallich Dedication.name: Vassallich Dedication
Vassallich Dedication.description:
Instead of the path trodden by many, your road to lichdom has been paved by another, a sponsor lich granting you power long before you could’ve managed it yourself. In doing so, you become a slave to their will, free from their direct control but leashed like any other undead. You gain the undead trait and the basic undead benefits. Unlike normal liches, however, you do not follow a path; your connection to your master shapes you instead. Disobeying your sponsor lich becomes anathema to you, with the lich knowing when you do so. You do not lose access to your powers when breaking this anathema, but your sponsor may not take kindly to your insolence; be careful, your vassallich soul cage begins in their possession. Your undead hunger is the same as your sponsor’s.

This tutelage is not without its benefits, however. The GM selects three spells from your sponsor’s spell list that shares a spell tradition with your lich tradition. You Learn these spells. Additionally, you gain a single cantrip of your choice from your lich tradition, which you can cast as an innate spell of your lich tradition.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the vassallich archetype, unless it is the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.F1gDdRbJQE4nIApQ]{Lich Dedication}.

prerequisites.value: ability to cast 3rd-level or higher spells from spell slots
had the ritual of vassallichdom successfully performed on you.

Vicious Fangs (HWW).name: 恶毒之牙 Vicious Fangs (HWW)
Vicious Fangs (HWW).description: 你将受害者的主动脉视为目标。你的尖牙和爪抓打击造成额外1点持续流血伤害（暴击时造成额外1d6持续流血伤害）。14级时，持续流血伤害分别增加至2和2d6；20级时增加至3和3d6。

prerequisites.value: 掠食突袭或尖牙吸血鬼能力

Void Shroud.name: Void Shroud
Void Shroud.description: You are surrounded by an aura of death which draws forth souls to be consumed by you. This aura is a 30-foot emanation. Enemies in the aura have a -2 status penalty to saving throws against death effects. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.GINUDs4l7d2QQxFH]{Steal Soul} free action.

Diableric Rewards.name: Diableric Rewards
Diableric Rewards.description:
The vampiric powers of the creature you’ve drained begin to manifest within your body. You gain one vampire ability from the victim that you do not have, or the advanced ability of a vampire ability that you and the victim share. At the GM’s discretion upon gaining a new vampire ability in this manner, you may also gain that ability’s advanced vampire ability; if you do, you also gain one vampire weakness from the victim that you do not have.

Special You can gain this Aftermath feat several times, gaining a different vampire ability each time.

prerequisites.value: You’ve completely drained another vampire of their blood

Perfect Necromancer.name: Perfect Necromancer
Perfect Necromancer.description: While Liches are immortal, you exist beyond even the normal levels of undead immortality, animated by a mixture of mythic and necromantic magic. During daily preparations, you are restored to full hit points as your phylactery fills your body with void energy. If you would ever be reduced to 0 hit points, you can expend a spell slot as a free action to instead be reduced to 1 hit point and regain hit points equal to twice the spell’s rank. Additionally, the number of undead minions you can have under your control becomes unlimited.

Steal Qi.name: Steal Qi
Steal Qi.description:
Through the usage of the hungry ghost stance, monks are capable of bolstering their own life force and even regaining lost qi. Whenever you would regain hit points due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.zTnYcqUG22WPXxtN]{Hungry Ghost Stance}, you may instead gain temporary hit points equal to the regained hit points.

Additionally, whenever you would critically hit or reduce a creature to 0 with a hungry ghost Strike, you can steal some of the creature’s qi. Instead of regaining hit points, you can immediately regain one Focus Point. Once you do this, you cannot steal any more qi until your next daily preparations.

Masterful Spellshapes.name: Masterful Spellshapes
Masterful Spellshapes.description:
Your mentor teaches your powerful ways to manipulate your spells. You gain one feat from the Wizard class with the spellshape trait of your level or lower. You do not need to be a Wizard, but must meet all other requirements.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different spellshape feat each time.

Mythic Soul Cage.name: Mythic Soul Cage
Mythic Soul Cage.description: Your soul cage is infused with mythic energy, causing it to become nearly indestructible. Your soul cage gains the artifact trait, as well as a Destruction method. This method is determined by you and the GM, but should be related to your method of becoming a lich, the item’s physical appearance, and your personal edicts and anathemas.
